jaxl.buffers package¶

Submodules¶

jaxl.buffers.buffers module¶

exception jaxl.buffers.buffers.CheckpointIndexError¶

Bases: Exception

Exception for when checkpointing is using invalid index.

exception jaxl.buffers.buffers.LengthMismatchError¶

Bases: Exception

Exception for when there is a length mismatch.

exception jaxl.buffers.buffers.NoSampleError¶

Bases: Exception

Exception for when buffer has no samples.

class jaxl.buffers.buffers.ReplayBuffer¶

Bases: ABC

The output data dimension.

abstract push(obs: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number, h_state: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number, act: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number, rew: float, terminated: bool, truncated: bool, info: dict, **kwargs) → bool¶

Push data into buffer.

Parameters:

  • obs (chex.Array) – the observation

  • h_state (chex.Array) – the hidden state

  • act (chex.Array) – the action taken

  • rew (float) – the reward

  • terminated (bool) – end of the episode

  • truncated (bool) – early truncation due to time limit

  • info (dict) – environment information

  • **kwargs –

Returns:

whether the sample is pushed successfully

Return type:

bool

Module contents¶

jaxl.buffers.get_buffer(buffer_config: SimpleNamespace, buffer_seed: int | None = None, env: DefaultGymWrapper | None = None, h_state_dim: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number = (1,)) → ReplayBuffer¶

Gets a buffer.

Parameters:

  • buffer_config (SimpleNamespace:) – the buffer configuration

  • buffer_seed (int: (Default value = None)) – the seed for buffer sampling

  • env (DefaultGymWrapper: (Default value = None)) – the environment

  • h_state_dim (chex.Array: (Default value = (1,)):) – the hidden state dimension

Returns:

a replay buffer

Return type:
